mc.printedText: Remove a creature card in your graveyard from the game: Regenerate Woodwraith Strangler.
mc.flavorText:
"Nothing could be more natural than roots sucking nourishment from the dead."
--Savra

mc.name: Flame Fusillade

mc.printedText: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
mc.flavorText:
"A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now that's military efficiency."
--Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant

mc.name: Nullmage Shepherd
mc.oracleText: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: Tap four untapped creatures you control: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: The shepherds work in secret, seeking out abominations against nature and returning them to earth and dust.

Enchant creature

mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, return enchanted creature and all Auras attached to that creature to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: Tharashk the Bold suddenly wasn't himself. Or anyone else, for that matter.

({B/G} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)

mc.printedText:
({BG} can be paid with either {B} or {G}.)
Regenerate target creature. At end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by that creature this turn.
mc.flavorText: Even the dead give way to the mineral gaze of the gorgon.

mc.name: Wojek Siren
mc.oracleText: Radiance - Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Radiance Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.

mc.name: Indentured Oaf
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.
mc.printedText: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.
mc.flavorText: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

mc.name: Vedalken Dismisser
mc.oracleText: When Vedalken Dismisser comes into play, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: When Vedalken Dismisser comes into play, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
"I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market."
--Sirislav, Dimir spy

mc.name: Greater Mossdog
mc.oracleText: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
mc.printedText: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
mc.flavorText: Man's best fungus.

mc.name: Excruciator
mc.oracleText: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.
mc.printedText: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.
mc.flavorText:
"Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study."
--Simic research notes

mc.name: Ordruun Commando
mc.oracleText: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
mc.printedText: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
mc.flavorText: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

mc.name: Surveilling Sprite
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Surveilling Sprite is put into a graveyard from play, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Surveilling Sprite is put into a graveyard from play, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

mc.name: Terraformer
mc.oracleText: {1}: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: Choose a basic land type. The land type of each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "This feels a little more like home."

mc.name: Dimir Cutpurse
mc.oracleText: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

mc.name: Screeching Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.
mc.flavorText: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.

mc.name: Lightning Helix
mc.oracleText: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
mc.flavorText: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

mc.name: Sell-Sword Brute
mc.oracleText: When Sell-Sword Brute is put into a graveyard from play, it deals 2 damage to you.
mc.printedText: When Sell-Sword Brute is put into a graveyard from play, it deals 2 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

mc.name: Bathe in Light
mc.oracleText: Radiance - Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Radiance Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

mc.name: Dromad Purebred
mc.oracleText: Whenever Dromad Purebred is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever Dromad Purebred is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen much from the back of my dromad, most of it terribly wrong. The more I see, the more I am convinced of the rightness of my path."
--Heruj, Selesnya initiate

mc.name: Courier Hawk
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText: Flying, vigilance
mc.flavorText: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

mc.name: Grayscaled Gharial
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk
mc.flavorText: Each tooth carries enough bacteria to kill a person in a day or two. But then, gharials do have 138 teeth.

Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying

Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
mc.flavorText: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Her ivy locks are a remnant of the wooded wilds now lost to Ravnica forever.

mc.name: Disembowel

mc.printedText: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X.
mc.flavorText:
"We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it was the victim, insides sucked out--just a sack of skin and robes."
--Agrus Kos

Flying

"Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed."

Trample

mc.printedText: {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.

mc.printedText: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

mc.name: Rain of Embers
mc.oracleText: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.flavorText: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

mc.name: Roofstalker Wight
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

mc.name: Transluminant
mc.oracleText: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play at end of turn.
mc.printedText: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Forget yourself. Forget your city. Forget your homes, your families, the debts and obligations that hold you to this world."

mc.name: Frenzied Goblin
mc.oracleText: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
mc.printedText: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
mc.flavorText: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

mc.name: Votary of the Conclave
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}: Regenerate Votary of the Conclave.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}: Regenerate Votary of the Conclave.
mc.flavorText: An ageless order, the votaries receive the gift of rejuvenation from the temple gardens they guard.

mc.name: Coalhauler Swine

mc.printedText: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.

mc.name: Veteran Armorer

mc.printedText: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.

mc.printedText: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

mc.flavorText: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

mc.name: Blood Funnel
mc.oracleText:
Noncreature spells you play cost {2} less to play.
Whenever you play a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.
mc.printedText:
Noncreature spells you play cost {2} less to play.
Whenever you play a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.

mc.name: Stoneshaker Shaman
mc.oracleText: At the end of each player's turn, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
mc.printedText: At the end of each player's turn, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
mc.flavorText: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

mc.name: Trophy Hunter
mc.oracleText:
{1}{G}: Trophy Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
Whenever a creature with flying dealt damage by Trophy Hunter this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Trophy Hunter.
mc.printedText:
{1}{G}: Trophy Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
Whenever a creature with flying dealt damage by Trophy Hunter this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Trophy Hunter.

mc.name: Concerted Effort
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each upkeep, all creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, all creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

mc.name: Tolsimir Wolfblood
mc.oracleText:
Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.
{T}: Put a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token named Voja into play.
mc.printedText:
Other green creatures you control get +1/+1.
Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.

mc.name: Circu, Dimir Lobotomist
mc.oracleText:
Whenever you play a blue spell, remove the top card of target library from the game.
Whenever you play a black spell, remove the top card of target library from the game.
Your opponents can't play nonland cards with the same name as a card removed from the game with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.
mc.printedText:
Whenever you play a blue spell, remove the top card of target library from the game.
Whenever you play a black spell, remove the top card of target library from the game.
Your opponents can't play nonland cards with the same name as a card removed from the game with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

mc.name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
mc.oracleText:
Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature.
Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

mc.name: Psychic Drain
mc.oracleText: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard and you gain X life.
mc.printedText: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard and you gain X life.
mc.flavorText:
"Gold can be reearned, goods restored. The moroii steal youth, more precious than either, and once gone, it's gone forever."
--Berta Suszat, civic healer

mc.name: Razia's Purification
mc.oracleText: Each player chooses three permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.
mc.printedText: Each player chooses three permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.
mc.flavorText: Only the chosen ones are spared.

mc.name: Doubling Season
mc.oracleText:
If an effect would put one or more tokens into play under your control, it puts twice that many of those tokens into play instead.
If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
mc.printedText:
If an effect would put one or more tokens into play under your control, it puts twice that many into play instead.
If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many on that permanent instead.

mc.name: Searing Meditation
mc.oracleText: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove."
--Alovnek, Boros guildmage
